bibl.title: ‘It is a difficult matter to be wronged by strangers, but to be wronged by kin is worst of all’. Inheritance and Conflict in Greco-Roman Egypt.

bibl.title: "Inheritance, Law and Religions in the Ancient and Mediaeval Worlds"

bibl.seg: Sabine R. Huebner, ‘It is a difficult matter to be wronged by strangers, but to be wronged by kin is worst of all’. Inheritance and Conflict in Greco-Roman Egypt.

Béatrice Caseau & Sabine R. Huebner (edd.), Inheritance, Law and Religions in the Ancient and Mediaeval Worlds = Centre de Recherche d'Histoire et Civilisation de Byzance. Monographies. 45 (Paris, 2014) pp. 99-108.
Introduction. - Inheritance patterns in the ancient Mediterranean. - Conclusions.
